revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Barkeep | class = BarKeep | game = Strife | doomednum = 72 | convid = 3 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Merchant|Merchant]]→BarKeep
A barkeep. Mostly inherited from the [[Classes:Merchant|Merchant]] class. Generally facilitates the transfer of alcohol to customers, but can be convinced to let some gossip slip if you sprinkle some coins in his hand. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR BarKeep : {{Class|Merchant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 4 {{Property|PainSound}} "barkeep/pain" {{Property|ActiveSound}} "barkeep/active" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_BARKEEP" // "Bar Keep" }
